column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia dubiako no mu no
column3: bosoom no ne da a odzi kan no
column4: na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ

column2: "Onyimpa ba
column3: osiandɛ Taere akasa etsia Jerusalɛm
column6: woebubu nyia nkyɛ ɔyɛ aman abobokɛse no; oebue ato me hɔ: mebɛhyɛ ma
column7: aber yi a ɔayɛ amamfo yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column3: Taere
column4: menye wo enya! Mebɛma amanaman pii aba wo do
column5: dɛ mbrɛ po ma n’asorɛkye ba."

column2: "Na wɔbɛsɛɛ Taere afasu
column3: na woedwuruw n’aban atsentsen no: mobɔtwerɛw ne dɛtse so mefi mu

column2: "Ɔbɛyɛ mboa hatabea wɔ po finimfin; na emi na maka
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse: na ɔbɛyɛ amanaman asadze."

column2: "Na ne nkorɔfo a wɔwowɔ mu no
column3: wɔdze afona bokuku hɔn: na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column3: medze Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar
column5: fi haban mu afamu bɛba Taere do

column2: "Ɔdze afona bɛsɛɛ wo nkuroba a wɔwɔ wo ase nyina: na obesi wo ho aban
column3: na ɔatow wo ho mpampi
column4: na ɔama akokyɛm no do etsia wo."

column2: "Na ɔdze n’afasubu ndadzefir besisi w’afasu ho
column3: na ɔdze no nkuma ebubu w’aban atsentsen no."

column2: "No mpɔnkɔ dodow ntsi hɔn ho huntuma bɛkata wo do: mpɔnkɔdofo
column3: na nhwiir
column4: na ntseaseanam hɔn dede ntsi w’afasu bɔwosow
column5: ber a ɔbɛhɛn w’abobokɛse mu no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ mbarimba hɛn kurow a woebu no no mu no."

column2: "Ɔdze no mpɔnkɔ ntɔtse betsiatsia w’abrɔn nyinara do: ɔdze afona boku ɔman no
column3: na w’ahoɔdzen n’edum no bɔhwe famu."

column2: "Na wɔdze w’ahonyadze bɛyɛ asadze
column3: na wɔafa w’eguadze afo: na wobodwuruw w’afasu egu famu
column4: na wɔasɛɛ w’efi fɛɛfɛw no: na wɔdze w’abo na wo ndua na wo dɛtse bogu nsu no mu."

column2: "Na mebɛma w’adwontow ne dede abɔ adze; na w’asanku ndze so wɔrenntse bio."
"Na mebɛyɛ wo ɔbotan pataa: ebɛyɛ mboa hatabea. Worinnsi wo bio: na emi EWURADZE na maka
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se Taere nye yi: Aso esupruw no nnkɔwosow wɔ w’asehwe ne dede ntsi
column3: ber a w’epirafo risi apen
column4: na worukuku wɔ wo mu no?"

column2: "Nna po do mbapɔmba nyina befifi hɔn nhengua do esiansian
column3: na woeyiyi hɔn ngudontar
column4: na wɔaworɔworɔw hɔn ntar a woedzi no akye: wobofura ahopopo: wɔbɛtsenatsena famu
column5: na hɔn ho apopo mbertsia biara mu
column6: na hɔn ho edwuruw hɔn wɔ wo ntsi."

column2: "Na wobotwa wo ho sukwadwom ase wo dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ edua asɛɛ nye yi
column4: ɔwo a apodofo bɛtsenaa wo mu
column5: O atsenka kurow ɔwo a nkyɛ eyɛ dzen wɔ po mu
column6: ɔwo na wo mu mba a hom maa hom ho hu tɔɔ hɔn a wɔtɔ kɔ hɔ nyina do!"

column2: "Afei nsuano aman no ho bɔpopo wɔ w’asehwe da no mu; nyew
column3: nsuano aman a wɔwɔ po ho no bo botutu wɔ wo nkɔree no ho."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ber a mebɛyɛ wo ekurofo
column3: dɛ nkurow a obi nntse mu no; ber a medze ebun no bɛba wo do
column4: na esukɛse akata wo do no;"

column2: "nna medze wo besian akɔ hɔn a wɔkɔ mona mu no ho
column3: ma aakɔ tsetseetse nkorɔfo no nkyɛn
column4: na mama akɛtsena asaase ne tsirmu no ho
column5: mbea a ɔyɛ amamfo fir tsetseetse
column6: wɔ hɔn a wɔkɔ mona mu no nkyɛn
column7: amma wɔaanntsena wo mu bio: na medze enyimnyam besi atseasefo asaase do:"

column2: "mebɛyɛ wo ehudze
column3: na erenntsena hɔ bio: kaansa wɔbɔhwehwɛ wo mpo a
